Sixun Dong
Yiqun Zhao
Dongze Lian

Shenghua Gao
dcterms:description: A dataset containing videos with multiple types of repetitive actions, designed to better reflect real-life scenarios where various actions coexist.
dcterms:title: Multi-RepCount

dcterms:creator: Debidatta Dwibedi
Yusuf Aytar
Jonathan Tompson
Pierre Sermanet
Andrew Zisserman
dcterms:description: A dataset for class-agnostic video repetition counting in the wild, typically including only one type of repetitive action for each video.
dcterms:title: RepCount

dcterms:creator: Huaidong Zhang
Xuemiao Xu
Guoqiang Han
Shengfeng He
dcterms:description: A dataset containing annotated repetition videos from the action recognition dataset UCF101, typically including only one type of repetitive action for each video.
dcterms:title: UCFRep

dcterms:creator: Huazhang Hu
Sixun Dong
Yiqun Zhao
Dongze Lian
Zhengxin Li
Shenghua Gao
dcterms:description: A dataset that includes fine-grained annotations and significant variation in length, collected from YouTube, and is considered challenging due to its characteristics.
dcterms:title: RepCount Part-A
